panels.description: To how many peers could we connect to during the last crawl.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  finished_at AS "time",
  dialable_peers
FROM crawls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(finished_at)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Online Peers (last crawl)

panels.description: Peers will leave the network in between crawls. This is the most recent and accurate approximation of dialable peers. This number is lower than the other one.

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(id) AS "id" FROM sessions WHERE finished = 'false';

panels.title: Online Peers (now)

panels.description: This panel answers the question: How many peers did we find in the DHT but could not connect to?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  finished_at AS "time",
  undialable_peers
FROM crawls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(finished_at)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Offline Peers (last crawl)

panels.description: In the next minute the monitoring (not crawling) process will dial this number of peers.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,48h),
  count(id) AS "id"
FROM sessions
WHERE
  next_dial_attempt < NOW()+'1m'::interval
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Peers to dial in the next minute

panels.description: Distribution of agent versions that match roughly "/go-ipfs/*/*" while the middle part is summed up and displayed here.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cp.updated_at AS "time",
  count AS " ",
  agent_version
FROM crawl_properties cp INNER JOIN agent_versions a ON cp.agent_version_id = a.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(cp.updated_at) and
  count > 100 and
  position('go-ipfs' in agent_version)>0
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: go-ipfs Agent Version Distribution

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cp.updated_at AS "time",
  agent_version,
  count AS " "
FROM crawl_properties cp INNER JOIN agent_versions a ON cp.agent_version_id = a.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(cp.updated_at) AND
  count > 100 AND
  crawl_id = (SELECT id from crawls where state='succeeded' order by created_at desc limit 1)
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: The distribution of connection errors that happened in the last crawl. 'unknown' means that there is no dedicated label for it yet.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cp.updated_at AS "time",
  count AS " ",
  undialable_peers,
  dialable_peers
FROM crawl_properties cp INNER JOIN crawls c ON cp.crawl_id = c.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(cp.updated_at)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Connection errors (last crawl)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  finished_at AS "time",
  crawled_peers AS "Total Peers",
  dialable_peers AS "Dialable Peers",
  undialable_peers AS "Undialable Peers"
FROM crawls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(finished_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  cp.updated_at AS "time",
  count AS " ",
  protocol
FROM crawl_properties cp INNER JOIN protocols p ON cp.protocol_id = p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(cp.updated_at) AND
  count > 200
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  finished_at AS "time",
  cast(dialable_peers as decimal)/cast(crawled_peers as decimal) AS "Ratio Dialable Peers"
FROM crawls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(finished_at)
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: The length of the queue of peers that need to be dialed from the monitoring process.
panels.title: Peers in dial queue

panels.description:
How many peers does the monitoring process dial per second?
How many errors do occur per second?
panels.title: Dial statistics in events/s

panels.description: Which type of errors do occur per second?
panels.title: Dial errors per second

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cp.updated_at AS "time",
  count AS " ",
  left(agent_version, 35)
FROM crawl_properties cp INNER JOIN agent_versions a ON cp.agent_version_id = a.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(cp.updated_at) AND
  agent_version NOT LIKE '%go-ipfs%' AND
  count > 10
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  cp.updated_at AS "time",
  count AS " ",
  left(agent_version, 35)
FROM crawl_properties cp INNER JOIN agent_versions a ON cp.agent_version_id = a.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(cp.updated_at) AND
  agent_version NOT LIKE '%go-ipfs%' AND
  count <= 10
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: The distribution of errors that happened during a crawl.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cp.updated_at AS "time",
  count AS " ",
  state
FROM crawl_properties cp INNER JOIN crawls c ON cp.crawl_id = c.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(cp.updated_at) and
  state = 'failed'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Crawl errors

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cp.updated_at AS "time",
  count AS " ",
  protocol
FROM crawl_properties cp INNER JOIN protocols p ON cp.protocol_id = p.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(cp.updated_at) AND
  count <= 200
ORDER BY 1
SELECT count(id) AS "id" FROM peers

SELECT
  count(id) AS "id"
FROM peers
WHERE
  multi_hash LIKE 'Qm%'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Total Peer IDs starting with Qm...

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  created_at AS "time",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM finished_at - started_at) as "duration"
FROM crawls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(id) AS "id"
FROM peers
WHERE
  multi_hash LIKE '12%'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,30m),
  avg(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM min_duration)) as "Min session length"
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,30m),
  avg(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM max_duration)) as "Max session length"
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(first_failed_dial,30m),
  count(id) AS "Sessions ended"
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(first_failed_dial)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,30m),
  count(id) AS "Sessions started"
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1
